title: The ProcessBuilder class makes it easy to send a command through the command line. All it requires is a List of Strings that make up the commands to be entered. You simply call the start() method on your ProcessBuilder instance to execute the command.

inline_content.Text: The ProcessBuilder class makes it easy to send a command through the command line. All it requires is a List of Strings that make up the commands to be entered. You simply call the start() method on your ProcessBuilder instance to execute the command.

title: Some things to keep in mind:

inline_content.Text: Some things to keep in mind:

title: The array of commands must all be a String array

inline_content.Text: The array of commands must all be a String array

title: The commands must be in the order (in the array) that they would be if you made the call to the program in the command line itself (ie. the name of the .exe can't go after the first argument

inline_content.Text: The commands must be in the order (in the array) that they would be if you made the call to the program in the command line itself (ie. the name of the .exe can't go after the first argument

title: When setting the working directory you need to pass in a File object and not just the file name as a String

inline_content.Text: When setting the working directory you need to pass in a File object and not just the file name as a String
